scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crowning with Thorns. A central figure, presumably Christ, is seated and wearing a purple robe. Two figures, one in blue and another in orange, are shown placing a crown of thorns upon his head. A fourth figure, in yellow and blue, kneels before the seated figure. The figures are positioned on a checkered floor within a golden, illuminated background, framed by a decorative blue initial.
